title: velvet~
description: `velvet~` is a velvet noise generator, which randomly chooses either positive (1) or negative (-1) impulses at random positions in a given period set in Hz. A polarity bias is possible to set the amount of positive and negative impulses. A time regularity parameter forces a impulses with less randomness. An amplitude irregularity forces random values (different than 1 or -1). The object has support for multichannel.
